hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export VMNAME="SCS-$$" /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init login /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init build /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init start securitycloud-jessie-small-metacloud ############
/puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd / && git clone http://esb.metacentrum.cz/puppet-securitycloud.git && cd puppet-securitycloud && sh securitycloud/bin/standalone.sh'
